Stereology.EditorialNote: Not sure that I agree with the supercategory here but will leave it for now.  Need to verify that "unbiased stereology" is a synonym for stereology.  I find it hard to believe that there is a biased stereology.
Stereology.Definition: An imaging assay that is used for the three-dimensional interpretation of planar sections of materials or tissues (Eagle i Resource Ontology:  http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/ERO_0001360)
